snippet: A four-decade feud among three brothers exploded when Thomas Athanasatos killed himself after shooting his brother James.
abstract: Four-decade feud among three brothers in Borough Park, Brooklyn, turns violent when 74-year-old Thomas Athanasatos shoots his 63-year-old brother James before using the gun to kill himself; James is expected to survive.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and ANN FARMER

lead_paragraph: A four-decade feud among three brothers exploded when Thomas Athanasatos killed himself after shooting his brother James.

headline.seo: Brother Shoots Brother, Then Kills Himself in Brooklyn
headline.main: Brother Shoots Brother, Then Kills Himself in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Brother Shoots Brother, Then Kills Himself in Brooklyn
